Articles.Content:
Hi I've started a new Kerbal Space Program youtube series. I would like it if people could check out my channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/lord123abc?feature=guide

I will be doing ordinary KSP videos every couple of days. If you watch my first 2 episodes make sure to turn your volume down because my mic was really bad then, in my newer episodes I have a new mic which will not give you ear ache.

In my latest episode I land on minmus with no landing legs and got there with only 8 parts!

<iframe width="560" height="315" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/-Ali8Gz3VUw" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

Hope people enjoy watching my videos, thanks for reading.

Impressive that you managed to land safely without it toppling over.

Were you able to get back too?
I haven't tried that yet, but in my next episode I'm going to send a rescue mission.
Nice! You have plenty of fuel to get back too.
I forgot to attach parachute and the nuclear engine isn't powerful to land back on kerbin (I don't think, not sure) so it looks like I'll be sending a rescue mission in a later episode.
